attributes.action: A complete review of MPs expenses.
attributes.additional_details: MPs expenses claim sheets are all the evidence we need.
attributes.background:
Some MPs are claiming for ridiculous items on expenses like shoes, makeup and washing machines. 
This is a blatent abuse of tax payers money. 
MPs are paid a wage and this wage should be used to fund these items not the tax payer!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
